title: [GAMEPLAY] Traditional Karma Missing VO
body:
Something that has bugged me for a long time when playing Traditional Karma is the few missing quotes she had for when she used her Mantra, and her Champion Select quote.

Taken from the wiki:
Upon casting Mantra.png Mantra (A dialect of ancient Ionian) (The meaning is according to Marowe, Player Support Escalation Specialist)
Play "Lath Rian Oune Vi." (Weave the threads of ____ )
Play "Gaen Na Kyri Vi." (Reap the winds of ____ )
Play "Sae Eleisa Tera Vi." (Discover the meaning of ____ )
And then, depending upon the spellcast
Q - "Phyla!" (Tranquility)
W - "Jia!" (Pain)
E - "Saera!" (Magic)

The last 3 on spellcast quotes are missing from traditional Karmas voiceover. Would it be possible to re-implement them?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oLe-S1IPXwg
Missing Mantra quotes begin around 1:04 in the video.

Furthermore, would it be possible to use Traditional karmas old champion select quote: http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/e1/Old_Karma_Select.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150113165508&filename=Old_Karma_Select.ogg
when one has her traditional skin selected in advance?

replies.body: Why where they intentionally left out? The quotes for using mantra on an ability better telegraph to your team which ability you used mantra on, which can be useful in hectic teamfights or for Renewal where the visual difference between W's mantra'd and non mantra cast can be hard to notice.

Hey Crowthen,

These were intentionally changed with the update of her kit. We don't have plans on adding these lines back into the game. This is working as intended. At this time, we don't have plans to add traditional VO into champion select.
